xwikidoc.title: GitHub Translations
xwikidoc.content: github.title=GitHub Synchronization Application github.description=Welcome at the GitHub Synchronization Application. With this application you can configure your GitHub repository / repositories - in multiple configurations, if you like - and sync the content of your wiki with GitHub. github.warning.programmingrightsrequired=This application can only run if the current page is saved by a user with Programming Rights. Make sure the page is saved by a user with Programming Rights and try again. github.warning.adminrightsrequired=Insufficient rights. Only Administrators can run this application. github.currentconfigs.title=Current GitHub configurations github.currentconfigs.noconfigs=No GitHub configurations found in this wiki. github.createnewconfig=Create a new GitHub configuration github.createnewimport.error.titlemissing=You must provide a name for your GitHub configuration. github.configsheet.title=GitHub Repository Configuration github.configsheet.compare.title=Changes with github.configsheet.debug=Debug github.configsheet.commitmessage=Message for this Commit github.configsheet.commitpom=Commit Maven POM-bestand github.configsheet.changebranch=Change Branch github.configsheet.listpages=Show pages that are out of sync github.configsheet.listpages.status=Sync status github.configsheet.listpages.action.viewdiff=Differences github.configsheet.listpages.action.viewdiffunformatted=Unformatted differences github.configsheet.commitall=Commit to GitHub
